sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A letter of enquiry to the reverend fathers of the Society of Jesus written in the person of a dissatisfied Roman Catholick. Taylor, James, fl. 1687-1689.
[4], 44 p.
Printed for William Rogers ... and Samuel Smith ..., London : 1689.
Signed at the end: A.B. Written by James Taylor. Cf. BM, NUC pre-1956, Wing. "I who make these enquiries, am a layman of the Church of England ..."--Advertisement. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
A letter of enquiry to the reverend fathers of the Society of Jesus written in the person of a dissatisfied Roman Catholick. Taylor, James, fl. 1687-1689.
[4], 44 p.
Printed for William Rogers ... and Samuel Smith ..., London : 1689.
Signed at the end: A.B. Written by James Taylor. Cf. BM, NUC pre-1956, Wing. "I who make these enquiries, am a layman of the Church of England ..."--Advertisement. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Samuel Smith
William Rogers
